function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within local communities and among international visitors due to close interaction and collaboration.","Impact":"Spread of diseases could lead to illness, strain on local healthcare systems, and damage to the reputation of the sustainable tourism model.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and sanitation protocols, provide education on contagious disease prevention, and establish monitoring and reporting mechanisms for symptoms.","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, sanitation devices, and communication platforms for reporting symptoms.","People":"Local communities, international visitors, project staff, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Project management, local healthcare authorities, international organizations."}]}
